item.description: Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#1769; 10:02PM; 6062 W Fountain Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3utWP8m; Hollywood; FIRE NOW OUT: At 9:48PM the LAFD received a call for a reported structure fire. The first arriving company found a small, one story bungalow with light smoke showing upon arrival. Firefighters initiated an offensive fire attack and located the fire in one room. They quickly extinguished the fire and conducted a search of the building. Firefighters located a deceased person. The preliminary investigation indicates a potential suspicious death prior to the fire. LAFD Arson and LAPD are responding for the full investigation. No further details at this time. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E27 E35 E52 RA82 T27; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0553; 10:10AM; 1354 N Highland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P03ReH; Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters fully extinguished the fire in 33 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire started in a one story commercial building which was attached (via a division wall) to a two story (street facing) commercial building. The fire extended into the attic of the one story. A primary and secondary search located no occupants in either building. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E229 E235 E26 E261 E35 E41 E76 RA27 RA6 T27 T29 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0553; 09:37AM; 1354 N Highland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P03ReH; Hollywood; Building type updated to a single story (exposing a two story attached commercial building). Firefighters are making good progress with the interior fire extinguished and are working to make access and extinguish the fire which extended to the attic.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E261 E35 E41 E76 RA27 RA6 T27 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0553; 09:37AM; 1354 N Highland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P03ReH; Hollywood; Two story, commercial building with moderate smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. This incident was initially reported as "bells ringing" automatic alarm and the first arriving company upgraded it to a structure fire incident. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E261 E35 E41 RA6 T27 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0118; 02:38AM; 4822 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P2mkXN; Sherman Oaks; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 38 minutes with no injuries reported. The outside fire extended down into the walls of one unit. Firefighters will remain on scene overhauling the unit involved to ensure all remaining pockets of smoldering fire within the walls are located and extinguished/dug out. No further details. ; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E102 E239 E278 E288 E88 RA88 T39 T78 T88; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0118; 02:00AM; 4822 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P2mkXN; Sherman Oaks; One story row of commercial occupancies with an outside fire that extended into one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E102 E239 E278 E288 E88 RA88 T39 T78 T88; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0839; 01:36PM; 767 W 97th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EY3DA9; Vermont Vista; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 39 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters conducted a coordinated roof operation and interior fire attack to locate the seat of the fire within building's common attic. They had to work their way through all four units to locate the stubborn fire while crews conducted salvage operations to protect the interior/belongings in the units. The fire was prevented from extending down into the living space. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E226 E264 E266 E57 E64 RA266 SQ21 T26 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0839; 12:57PM; 767 W 97th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EY3DA9; Vermont Vista; One story building with four bungalows (they have a common attic) with an attic fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E266 E57 E64 RA266 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1689; 08:11PM; 8108 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VwtwOp; Vermont Knolls; KNOCKDOWN: 22 firefighters made quick work and extinguished the fire in only 10 minutes with no injuries reported. They contained the fire to the unit of origin, defending both the adjacent units and the attic from fire extension. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E221 E233 E264 E33 E57 RA257 RA857 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1689; 08:01PM; 8108 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VwtwOp; Vermont Knolls; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire showing from one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested (not reflected in this alert).; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E57 RA257 T33 T64; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart
